arabic_text: إنما الأعمال بالنيات وإنما لكل امرئ ما نوى
english_translation: Actions are by intentions and every person will have what they intended
The best of you are those who learn the Quran and teach it

arabic_text: المسلم من سلم المسلمون من لسانه ويده
english_translation: A Muslim is one from whose tongue and hands other Muslims are safe

arabic_text: لا يؤمن أحدكم حتى يحب لأخيه ما يحب لنفسه
english_translation: None of you truly believes until he loves for his brother what he loves for himself

arabic_text: من كان يؤمن بالله واليوم الآخر فليقل خيرا أو ليصمت
english_translation: Whoever believes in Allah and the Last Day should speak good or remain silent
